title: Geth crashes with error unexpectedly
body:
#### System information

> Version: 1.7.2-stable
> Git Commit: 1db4ecdc0b9e828ff65777fb466fc7c1d04e0de9
> Architecture: amd64
> Protocol Versions: [63 62]
> Network Id: 1
> Go Version: go1.9
> Operating System: linux
> GOPATH=
> GOROOT=/usr/lib/go-1.9
> 

#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour


#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

`geth --rpc --rpcapi "personal,eth,web3" --rpcaddr "0.0.0.0" --rpccorsdomain "*" --cache=1024`

#### Error

